resources.string:
"Emanating from the roots of technology, ISTE Students ' Chapter Manipal constitutes of a group of motivated people constantly pushing each other on individual as well as collective progress, cherishing milestones on the way.

Whether it 's hosting TechTatva 's most popular event Acumen, or hosting coding sprints like Enigma, we are dedicated to providing the best. We connect the student community with experts from the industry sharing potential game changing tips in the webinars. Interview experiences from seniors act as cherry on top, giving new direction and building a sense of strategy in the minds of countless fresh talent.

AI Sundays and Science in Storytelling takes you back to the holy grail of science and tech, which encompasses a part of our social media. Workshops throughout the year acts as a kickstarter giving hands-on-experience to students across the campus.

While you're at our page, make sure to go through the treasure trove of information present here, which is outbound to have a positive impact on your day.
"
